_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

When Ornn reaches level 13, he will upgrade one of his Legendary items into a Masterwork item. Only certain Legendary items can be upgraded into Masterwork items and Ornn can only one Masterwork item. For each level after 13, Ornn can upgrade an ally's upgradable Legendary item by clicking on them while nearby.

Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus Health, Armor, and Magic Resist from all sources. This value increases by 4% of these bonus stats per Legendary item Ornn upgrades into Masterwork item.
Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure dealing [[0]] and [[1]] by 40% for 2 seconds. A pillar of rock forms at the fissure's end for 4 seconds.

Ornn stomps forward Unstoppably while breathing fire, dealing [[0]] over 0.75 seconds. Enemies hit by the final bout of flame become [[1]] for 3 seconds.

[[2]] effects on [[3]] targets have their duration increased by 30% and deal an additional [[4]]. Ornn's Attacks against [[5]] targets [[6]] them [[7]], dealing the additional damage.

Ornn charges, dealing [[0]]. If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that knocks up enemies for 1.25 seconds and applies the same damage to those not hit by the charge.

Ornn's charge destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemies.

Ornn summons a massive lava elemental, which stampedes towards him, dealing [[0]], applying [[1]] to, and [[2]] enemies hit by 40/50% for 3 seconds.

Ornn can [[3]] to dash with a headbutt. If he dashes into the elemental, he redirects and empowers it, causing it to [[4]] the first champion for 1 second and subsequent champions for 0.5 seconds. The elemental also deals [[5]] and reapplies [[6]].

Change.Before: Health and mana items built in the field provide 100% of health and mana values
Change.After: Health and mana items built in the field retain its previous health and mana percentage (returning to base still brings health and mana items back to full)
Change.parsedAfter: Health and mana items built in the field retain its previous health and mana percentage (returning to base still brings health and mana items back to full)

Change.After: 1 for Ornn and allies (since Ornn is still subject to the 1 Mythic limit)
Change.parsedAfter: 1 for Ornn and allies (since Ornn is still subject to the 1 Mythic limit)

Change.Before: Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus armor and magic resistance
Change.After: Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus health, armor, and magic resistance
Change.parsedAfter: Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus health, armor, and magic resistance

Change.After: Ornn gains an additional 4% bonus health, armor, and magic resistance for each Mythic item he upgrades into a Masterwork

R.SpellName: R - Call of the Forge God

Change.After: Ornn can now upgrade all (minus a few exceptions like Mejai's Soulstealer, Archangel's Staff, and similar items) Legendary items to Masterwork items.
Masterwork Items gain extra stats based on the stats the original Legendary item provides. (If an item gives AD and HP, the upgrade will give you more AD and HP etc.)
